name: Hyphen
long_description: Hyphen enables Medical AI research teams and decision support solutions prepare high quality training datasets from CT Scans, X Rays and MRIs. With Hyphen, you can collect radiology data from hospitals/labs and create workflows for annotation & reviews. Hyphen also allows monitoring the skill levels of the labelling workforce. We equip labelers with AI-assists for annotations, 3D tools to view and make pixel-perfect markings while enabling reviewers to set up automated error-checking using consensus mechanisms.
